nodes.text: Doctor Chavani was a female therapist who in the year 5 ABY treated the former Imperial prisoner Brentin Lore Wexley after he was freed from Ashmead's Lock on the planet Kashyyyk by the New Republic during the Liberation of Kashyyyk. Chavani spoke to Wexley's son Temmin and reassured that it would be normal for his father to regularly go on long walks, as a lot had likely built up in Brentin Wexley's mind during the years he was imprisoned.
Chavani was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath: Life Debt, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released released on July 12, 2016.
